content: चिह्नं {@--1@} Mark, spot, stamp, symbol; emblem, badge, symptom; ग्रामेषु यूपचिह्नेषु <ls>R. 1. 44</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 55</ls>; संनिपातस्य चिह्नानि <ls>Pt. 1. 177.</ls> {@--2@} A sign, indication; प्रसादचिह्नानि पुरःफलानि <ls>R. 2. 22</ls>; प्रहर्षचिह्न <ls n="R.">2. 68.</ls> {@--3@} A sign of the zodiac. {@--4@} Stamp, print, impression; पद°. {@--5@} Aim, direction.
